feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo, a developer, has rebased onto wallet class and announced that Wallet Encryption is in a pull-able state after a lot of good discussion and a tiny bit of results. He also shared the link to the GitHub repository for further reference. The message was posted on the Bitcoin mailing list seeking final comments/ACKs.
